name: The Reconnection Clinic
description:
Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4 (Theme: "Connect").

You assume the role of an underground marriage counselor, providing an incredibly unique, and questionably moral, service. Listen to the issues of today's patients, then pilot a ship through their minds, destroying memories in attempt to reconnect the struggling couple. But, be careful, don't destroy too many, or you may damage them forever.

Try to find the ending where you save their marriage.

If you enjoyed, consider following me on Twitter: @austintradr
